author: AETerry
title: Fabuland Elephant
review:
I remember this set....

 

This like many other numerous Fabuland sets caters to an age group of children who are interested in playing with just a minifigure and some little accessories.

 

You've got the elephant, chair, table, umbrella and 2 cups. Strangely I still have all the pieces after all these years... only my umbrella and cups are red, not yellow as shown on the picture.
